: : Lunekill/Rodimus Prime : :

Windlord's shot knocks Lunekill over, weak and distracted by the ultra-sonic attack. Lune manages to swing her arm around releasing short burst of energy blasts in directions all around her.

Rodimus pulls his wife close to him, keeping her down.

Rodimus Prime: I believe Elita will be safe. As for our situation, the base is taking a pounding. I dont know much longer the shields can hold out. It looks like we got one taken out with that ultra-sonic sound. The other one is dangerously close to releasing a nano-virus on himself that may stop him.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord/Nightlight:

windlord took advantage and shot against Lunekill. Nighlight arrieved 
where Rodimus where and said "What's situations??? are Elita safe in 
CR's area???? I left her inside one...."


OOC: Cr's aarea is in center of base1




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Lunekill : :
> 
> The ultra sonic sound was the first thing to get to Lunekill in 
this battle. She haults her attack and doubles over, covering her 
audio receptors with her hands...
> 
> 
> Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> New Hope: A Supersonic Scream is comming through the sky in the 
Maximals base. It is closing in fast. and Locking onto Lunekill and 
Fires. in a straffing Run targeting LuneKills Joints and then Flying 
Up into the sky and Transforming Into a robot and Comming down at her 
With a Cresent bladed Staff.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: Windlord/Nighlight:
> 
> Windlord fired back while Nighlight ran toward the base.
> 
>

<DIV><STRONG>: : Lunekill/Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>Windlord's shot knocks Lunekill over, weak and distracted by the ultra-sonic attack. Lune manages to swing her arm around releasing short burst of energy blasts in directions all around her.</P>
<P>Rodimus pulls his wife close to him, keeping her down.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>I believe Elita will be safe. As for our situation, the base is taking a pounding. I dont know much longer the shields can hold out. It looks like we got one taken out with that ultra-sonic sound. The other one is dangerously close to releasing a nano-virus on himself that may stop him.</P>
